attributes.action: apologise for misleading the public that our economy was in the best position than all other global economies for recovery when ours is now still in recession whilst most are now in recovery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to unacceptable government borrowing, instability within the financial sector still and with not enough being done to help britain's small business or manufacturing sector we are still in recession and are suffering the effects of it.
